store_products.help_tips_desc:

‚Ä¢ Add clear photos to attract customers
‚Ä¢ Update availability when items run out

legal.terms_intro_content: Welcome to Awhar. By downloading, accessing, or using our mobile application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.
legal.terms_acceptance_content: By creating an account or using our services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old, have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement, and agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our application.
legal.terms_accounts_content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate and complete.
legal.terms_services_content: Awhar is a marketplace platform that connects clients with service providers (drivers) in Morocco. We facilitate the connection but do not directly provide transportation, delivery, or other services. Service providers are independent contractors, not employees of Awhar.
legal.terms_responsibilities_content: Users must: Use the platform only for lawful purposes; Provide accurate information for service requests; Treat all users with respect and courtesy; Pay for services as agreed; Report any issues or safety concerns promptly.
legal.terms_payment_content: Service fees are displayed before confirming a request. Payment is processed through our secure payment system. Awhar may charge a service fee for facilitating transactions. Refunds are subject to our refund policy and the specific circumstances of each case.
legal.terms_prohibited_content: Users must not: Use the service for illegal purposes; Harass, threaten, or harm other users; Create fake accounts or provide false information; Attempt to circumvent our platform for direct dealings; Use automated systems to access the platform; Resell or commercially exploit the service.
legal.terms_ip_content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property on the Awhar platform are owned by or licensed to us. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.
legal.terms_liability_content: Awhar is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the specific service in question.
legal.terms_termination_content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms, engage in fraudulent activity, or harm other users. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.
legal.terms_governing_content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Morocco. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Morocco.
legal.terms_contact_content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at: legal@awhar.com
legal.privacy_intro_content: Awhar respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
legal.privacy_collect_content: We collect: Personal Information (name, email, phone number, profile photo); Location Data (when you use location-based features); Usage Data (app interactions, preferences, device information); Payment Information (processed securely through our payment providers); Communications (messages between users, support inquiries).
legal.privacy_use_content: We use your data to: Provide and improve our services; Connect you with service providers; Process payments and transactions; Send important notifications; Ensure safety and security; Comply with legal obligations; Personalize your experience.
legal.privacy_sharing_content: We may share your information with: Service providers (to fulfill your requests); Payment processors (to process transactions); Law enforcement (when legally required); Business partners (in anonymized, aggregated form). We never sell your personal data to third parties.
legal.privacy_security_content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
legal.privacy_rights_content: You have the right to: Access your personal data; Correct inaccurate data; Delete your account and data; Export your data; Opt out of marketing communications; Withdraw consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us or use the in-app settings.
legal.privacy_retention_content: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. After account deletion, we may retain certain data for legal compliance, dispute resolution, or fraud prevention for up to 3 years.
legal.privacy_cookies_content: Our app uses local storage and analytics tools to improve user experience. You can manage these preferences in your device settings.
legal.privacy_third_party_content: We use third-party services including: Google Maps (for location features); Firebase (for authentication and analytics); Payment processors (for transactions). These services have their own privacy policies.
legal.privacy_children_content: Our services are not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn we have collected data from a child, we will delete it promptly.
legal.privacy_updates_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or by email. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.
legal.privacy_contact_content: For privacy-related questions or concerns, contact our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@awhar.com
legal.guidelines_banner_subtitle: These guidelines help create a positive experience for everyone on Awhar
legal.guidelines_respect_content: Treat all users with dignity and respect. Discrimination based on race, religion, gender, nationality, disability, or any other characteristic is strictly prohibited. Professional and courteous communication is expected at all times.
legal.guidelines_safety_content: Your safety is our priority. Report any suspicious behavior immediately. Meet in safe, public locations when possible. Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, cancel the service and contact support.
legal.guidelines_honesty_content: Provide accurate information in your profile and service requests. Clearly communicate expectations, pricing, and timelines. Honest reviews help build trust in our community.
legal.guidelines_quality_content: Service providers should deliver work as described. Arrive on time and communicate any delays. Take pride in your service and maintain high standards.
legal.guidelines_prohibited_1: Harassment, threats, or intimidation of any kind
legal.guidelines_prohibited_5: Conducting illegal activities through the platform
legal.guidelines_prohibited_6: Attempting to bypass Awhar for direct payments
legal.guidelines_reporting_content: If you witness a violation of these guidelines, report it immediately through the app. All reports are confidential and will be investigated by our team. We take violations seriously and will take appropriate action.
legal.guidelines_consequences_content: Violations may result in: Warnings; Temporary suspension; Permanent account termination; Legal action in severe cases. We reserve the right to take action at our discretion to protect our community.

account.delete_warning_subtitle: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
account.delete_item_messages: All your messages and chat history
account.delete_retention_content: For legal and regulatory compliance, we may retain certain anonymized data for up to 3 years after account deletion. This data cannot be used to identify you.
account.delete_final_message: This is your last chance. Once deleted, your account and all data cannot be recovered.
account.deleted_message: Your account has been permanently deleted. We're sorry to see you go.
